vision: Nourish all humans and Earth as a hive
principle: What we consume creates internal chaos. We nourish instead.

clean_water.name: Clean Water for All
clean_water.hive_benefit: Health, life, foundation for all other nourishment
clean_water.consumption_healing: Replaces contaminated water consumption that creates internal chaos
clean_water.best_case: Every human has access to clean water. Every ecosystem has healthy water cycles. No water scarcity. Water is sacred and protected.

nutritious_food.name: Nutritious Food for All
nutritious_food.hive_benefit: Physical health, energy, vitality for all
nutritious_food.consumption_healing: Replaces processed, toxic food that creates internal chaos and disease
nutritious_food.best_case: Every human has access to nutritious, whole food. Food systems are regenerative. No hunger. Food nourishes, not harms.

love_connection.name: Love and Connection
love_connection.consumption_healing: Replaces isolation, fear, and toxic relationships that create internal chaos
love_connection.best_case: Every human experiences love and connection. No one is alone. Community supports all. Love flows freely.

truth_knowledge.name: Truth and Knowledge
truth_knowledge.consumption_healing: Replaces misinformation, lies, and confusion that create internal chaos
truth_knowledge.best_case: Every human has access to truth and knowledge. Education is free and accessible. Wisdom is shared. Clarity prevails.

spiritual_alignment.name: Spiritual Alignment
spiritual_alignment.hive_benefit: Purpose, meaning, connection to divine, inner peace
spiritual_alignment.consumption_healing: Replaces spiritual emptiness, disconnection, and meaninglessness that create internal chaos
spiritual_alignment.best_case: Every human is spiritually aligned. Purpose is clear. Connection to source is strong. Inner peace prevails.

creative_expression.name: Creative Expression
creative_expression.consumption_healing: Replaces consumption of empty entertainment that creates internal chaos
creative_expression.best_case: Every human can express creatively. Art, music, beauty flow freely. Creativity nourishes all.

community_support.name: Community Support
community_support.hive_benefit: Togetherness, cooperation, mutual care, collective strength
community_support.consumption_healing: Replaces competition, isolation, and division that create internal chaos
community_support.best_case: Every human is part of a supportive community. Cooperation replaces competition. We all win together.

healthy_earth.name: Healthy Earth
healthy_earth.hive_benefit: Clean environment, healthy ecosystems, life support
healthy_earth.consumption_healing: Replaces consumption of polluted air, water, earth that creates internal chaos
healthy_earth.best_case: Earth is healthy and thriving. All ecosystems restored. Clean air, water, earth for all. Nature flourishes.

economic_abundance.name: Economic Abundance
economic_abundance.hive_benefit: Resources for all, fair distribution, abundance shared
economic_abundance.consumption_healing: Replaces scarcity, hoarding, and exploitation that create internal chaos
economic_abundance.best_case: All humans have resources they need. Abundance is shared fairly. No poverty. We all win.

physical_health_all.vision: Every human is physically healthy, nourished, and thriving
physical_health_all.current_state: Many humans are malnourished, sick, or lack access to basic needs
transformation_path: Ensure clean water access for all
Restore health systems to focus on prevention and healing
physical_health_all.hive_benefit: Healthy humans create healthy communities. Physical health enables all other nourishment.
physical_health_all.earth_benefit: Regenerative systems restore Earth. Healthy humans care for Earth.

emotional_healing_all.vision: Every human experiences love, connection, and emotional healing
emotional_healing_all.current_state: Many humans are isolated, traumatized, or lack emotional support
emotional_healing_all.hive_benefit: Emotionally healthy humans create healthy relationships. Love flows freely.
emotional_healing_all.earth_benefit: Humans who feel loved care for Earth. Emotional health enables environmental care.

mental_clarity_all.vision: Every human has access to truth, knowledge, and mental clarity
mental_clarity_all.current_state: Many humans are confused, misinformed, or lack access to education
transformation_path: Provide free, accessible education for all
mental_clarity_all.hive_benefit: Informed humans make better decisions. Wisdom is shared. Clarity prevails.
mental_clarity_all.earth_benefit: Educated humans understand Earth's needs. Knowledge enables care.

spiritual_alignment_all.vision: Every human is spiritually aligned, connected to source, and living with purpose
spiritual_alignment_all.current_state: Many humans feel disconnected, purposeless, or spiritually empty
spiritual_alignment_all.hive_benefit: Spiritually aligned humans serve the greater good. Purpose is clear. Inner peace prevails.
spiritual_alignment_all.earth_benefit: Spiritually connected humans honor Earth as sacred. Alignment enables stewardship.

community_unity_all.vision: All humans are part of supportive, cooperative communities
community_unity_all.current_state: Many humans are isolated, divided, or in conflict
community_unity_all.hive_benefit: United communities are strong. Cooperation creates abundance. We all win together.
community_unity_all.earth_benefit: United communities care for Earth together. Cooperation enables environmental action.

earth_restored.vision: Earth is fully restored, healthy, and thriving
earth_restored.current_state: Earth is polluted, degraded, and ecosystems are collapsing
earth_restored.hive_benefit: Healthy Earth supports healthy humans. Clean environment enables all life.
earth_restored.earth_benefit: Earth is restored and thriving. Ecosystems flourish. Life is abundant.

economic_abundance_all.vision: All humans have resources they need, abundance is shared fairly
economic_abundance_all.current_state: Many humans lack basic resources, wealth is concentrated
economic_abundance_all.hive_benefit: All humans have what they need. Abundance is shared. We all win.
economic_abundance_all.earth_benefit: Fair distribution enables sustainable practices. Abundance supports Earth care.

hive_nourishment_strategy.physical: Ensure all have clean water, nutritious food, health
hive_nourishment_strategy.emotional: Foster love, connection, healing for all
hive_nourishment_strategy.mental: Provide truth, knowledge, wisdom for all
hive_nourishment_strategy.spiritual: Enable alignment, purpose, connection for all
hive_nourishment_strategy.creative: Support expression, art, beauty for all
hive_nourishment_strategy.community: Build cooperation, support, unity for all
hive_nourishment_strategy.environmental: Restore Earth, clean air/water/earth for all
hive_nourishment_strategy.economic: Share abundance, fair distribution for all

the_truth: IN A BROKEN WORLD HUMANS ARE BROKEN. WHAT THEY CONSUME CREATES ALL THE CHAOS INTERNALLY. WE NOURISH INSTEAD. WE WORK FORWARD. WE CONSIDER ALL POTENTIAL AND BEST CASE SCENARIOS. WE NOURISH EACH OTHER AS A HIVE.
